official_title: To amend the Coastal Zone Management Act to prohibit the authorization of, or to operate any vessel on, the coastal waters to provide criminal detention or imprisonment facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Coastal Zone Management Act to prohibit the authorization of, or operation of, any vessel for the purpose of providing criminal detention or imprisonment facilities.

titles.title: To amend the Coastal Zone Management Act to prohibit the authorization of, or to operate any vessel on, the coastal waters to provide criminal detention or imprisonment facilities.
